recipesJson.name: Strawberry Pancakes with Syrup
recipesJson.author: KaptenUtbrott
recipesJson.description:
Its fluffy, its good, try it yourself :)

***THE STRAWBERRY***
*CAP Sweet Strawberry* and *TPA Strawberry Ripe* - one of my favourite strawberries combo
***THE PANCAKE***
*FW Yellow Cake*, *TPA Sweet Cream*, *TPA Vanilla Cupcake* - this gives you nice, vanilla, fluffy pancakes, not too sweet. Just right.
***THE SWEET FINISH***
Of course you can't forget about melted butter and maple syrup on your breakfast pancakes - *CAP Golden Butter* and *TPA Maple Syrup* are just perfect for the job.
Recipe high in DAAP, but that gives it that flavour oomph :)
Steep atleast a week for a nice balance of flavours, feel free to adapt this to your taste buds :)

reviews.text: Light fluffy, pancakes, butter, syrup, sweet juicy strawberries, and just a touch of whipped cream. Just, damn, man. Breakfast is back on the menu, boys!
